debounceDelay.title: Debounce Delay (ms)
debounceDelay.description: The time to wait in milliseconds after a user stops typing before updating the lineage widget. Requires a page reload to take effect.

replaceDataflowInUDFs.title: Replace Dataflow in UDFs
replaceDataflowInUDFs.description: Replace user-defined function (UDF) calls with actual dataflow and connect with return value of function call.

highlightRelevantSubgraphs.title: Highlight Relevant Subgraphs
highlightRelevantSubgraphs.description: Highlight relevant subgraphs and remove non-data paths.

greedyNotebookExtraction.title: Greedy Notebook Extraction
greedyNotebookExtraction.description: Extract all the code from top to bottom and ignore cell execution order (if turned false, code gets ordered by execution number and ignored if no execution at all)

llmClassification.title: LLM Lineage Classification
llmClassification.description: Use LLM for classifying nodes in the data flow graph (DFG).
